page.title: 11Ulverston Financial Services
page.content: Three major{clearing banks}are rep- resented. Barclays' site in County Sq. was originally Martins Bank. National Westminster,2a Queen St.,was the District Bank. The Midland,New Market St.,was formerly the Cumberland Union Bank. Nat.West and Midland have recently installed electric service tills. Trustee Savings Bank have a branch in Union Street. Eleven{Building Societies}are rep- resented: Anglia,Bradford & Bingley, Furness (est.locally with Head Office in Barrow),Halifax,Leeds Permanent, National & Provincial,Newcastle,North- ern Rock,Nationwide,Woolwich,and Abbey National. The{Post Office}has a wide range of financial services,eg.banking through Girobank and various savings accounts.
